title: Tic Tac Toe!
description: One of the projects that I work on with my students is a simple Tic Tac Toe website using HTML/CSS and JavaScript. Some cool features for this website are css effects, interactive components and logic that can     determine if someone won the tic tac toe game!

title: Bagel Game!
description: Bagel game is a project that I work on with a students using HTML/CSS and JavaScript. Some cool features for this website are css effects, interactive components and logic that can determine if someone won the tic tac toe game!
